name: capstone-project-two-c957e22189a3499eb30d05071e5821a4
description: We have broken down the Capstone Project into easy-to-follow steps. Each step of the capstone contains a link with instructions for that step. You may notice this secondCapstone follows a similar pattern to your first Capstone, however, there are key differences.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
